descriptions: Student is unable to write any numbers from 0 to 20.
Student can write only a few numbers (1-5) from 0 to 20 with frequent errors.
Student can write some numbers (6-10) from 0 to 20, but makes several errors.
Student can write most numbers (11-15) from 0 to 20 with occasional errors.
Student can accurately write almost all numbers (16-20) from 0 to 20 with very few errors.
Student can accurately and consistently write all numbers from 0 to 20 with no errors.
Student cannot represent any number of objects with a written numeral.
Student can represent a small quantity of objects (1-5) with a written numeral but struggles with accuracy.
Student can represent a quantity of objects (6-10) with a written numeral, but makes several mistakes.
Student can represent most quantities of objects (11-15) with a written numeral with occasional errors.
Student can accurately represent almost all quantities of objects (16-20) with a written numeral and makes very few errors.
Student can accurately and consistently represent any quantity of objects (0-20) with the correct written numeral and demonstrates understanding of '0' as representing no objects.
